name: The Smurfs 2
description:
Nintendo.com Description (from Ad Blurbs)



Relive The Smurfs 2 movie on Nintendo DS in this interactive storybook! Play mini-games inspired by key moments from the movie, alongside the storybook – like Clumsy Kung-Fu, Super Storks, and Smurf-a-pult!

• Fun for All Ages: The Smurfs 2 is a fun and accessible game for all ages!

• Interactive Story: Read the story on one screen and interact with the scene on the other!

• Variety of Mini-Games: Play nine different Smurf-inspired mini-games!

• Collect a Smurf: After each mini-game, play Find The Smurf and every Smurf found will be added to your in-game collection!

shot.caption: Main Menu (Picture book, Mini-games, and Smurf Collection)
